alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the sulfonyl group, with the general structure RS(=O)2R' ( R,R' must not be H).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfonyls

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the sulfonic acid group, which has the general structure RS(=O)2OH (R is not a hydrogen atom).
alternative_parents.name: Organosulfonic acids

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a methanesulfonate moiety, which consists of a methane linked to the sulfur atom of a sulfonate group.
alternative_parents.name: Methanesulfonates

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds in which exactly three of the four hydrogen atoms of methane (CH4) are replaced by halogen atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Trihalomethanes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing metals and halogens. Some are ionic while others are covalently bonded.
alternative_parents.name: Organic metal halides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a fluorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organofluorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the alkyl fluoride functional group with formula R-F , where R is an alkyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl fluorides

class.description: Compounds containing a sulfonic acid or derivative, with the general structure RS(=O)2X (R= H or organyl group, X=any heteroatom).
class.name: Organic sulfonic acids and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as trifluoromethanesulfonates. These are alkanesulfonic acids, that contain a sulfonate group that is substituted with a trifluoromethyl group.

direct_parent.description: Alkanesulfonic acids, that contain a sulfonate group that is substituted with a trifluoromethyl group.
direct_parent.name: Trifluoromethanesulfonates

intermediate_nodes.description: Organic acids containing an alkane chain linked to a sulfonic acid group. They have the general structure RS(=O)2-OR' (R = alkyl, R' = any atom).
intermediate_nodes.name: Alkanesulfonic acids and derivatives

intermediate_nodes.description: Organic acids containing an alkane chain linked to a sulfonic acid group. They have the general structure RS(=O)2-OH (R = alkyl).
intermediate_nodes.name: Alkanesulfonic acids

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing a sulfonic acid or derivative, with the general structure RS(=O)2X (R=alkyl, aryl; X=any heteroatom).
subclass.name: Organosulfonic acids and derivatives

superclass.description: Compounds an organic acid or a derivative thereof.
superclass.name: Organic acids and derivatives
